titles.title: Wildfire-Resilient Communities Act
A bill to provide mandatory funding to the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out hazardous fuels reduction projects on National Forest System land, and for other purposes.
Wildfire-Resilient Communities Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Wildfire-Resilient Communities Act
This bill permanently funds the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Fund, provides for financial and technical assistance to at-risk communities, modifies the limits on the number of proposals that may be funded for ecological restoration treatments for priority forest landscapes under the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program, and establishes the County Stewardship Fund for making payments to counties that have a contract for a stewardship contracting project on federal land within their boundaries.
